talk.author: did:plc:sq6bfb2ygwkgotzmezezzi36
talk.utter: When I joined here I posted at the Bird app to ask who wanted an invite code. I have invited everyone that responded in order, and I’m down to my last 2 before I’m free to abandon it. If anybody can spare me a code, you will be freeing me from my obligations

talk.author: did:plc:sq6bfb2ygwkgotzmezezzi36
talk.utter: Just double-checked my list and I’m actually down to one person.

talk.author: did:plc:sq6bfb2ygwkgotzmezezzi36
talk.utter: Is there a way to find out who used a code? The twitter mufo I gave this to says it doesn’t work

talk.author: did:plc:sq6bfb2ygwkgotzmezezzi36
talk.utter: That’s not them. I got the new code, should we delete the skeets? And should I remember to never call them skeets again?

talk.author: did:plc:6lydbdtbcwdyx52vboc42gya
talk.utter: I don’t have that many followers. How are people stealing the codes so quickly? I have two more but…

talk.author: did:plc:sq6bfb2ygwkgotzmezezzi36
